ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.controllers

Class StoryListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ualberta.g12.adventurecreator.controllers.StoryListController

  • public class StoryListController
extends Object
    A controller class that is used to modify the StoryList data singleton. All changes to the StoryList singleton should be done through this class. This class will automatically save changes to the StoryList singleton using the OfflineHelper Singleton.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StoryListController(StoryList sc, OfflineIOHelper oih)
      Constructs a new StoryListController object set to the given StoryList and OfflineIoHelper Singletons.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addStory(Story s)
      Adds the given story to the StoryList.
      void createBlankStory()
      Creates a blank story by calling the no argument constructor of Story and adds it to the StoryList.
      void saveOfflineStories(StoryList storyList)
      Called whenever we want to save all of the stories in the StoryList to disk using the OfflineIOHelper.
      void setStory(Story s, int pos)
      Replaces the story currently at position pos with the given story.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • StoryListController

        public StoryListController(StoryList sc,
                   OfflineIOHelper oih)
        Constructs a new StoryListController object set to the given StoryList and OfflineIoHelper Singletons.
        Parameters:
        sc - The StoryList that this StoryListController will be modifying
        oih - The OfflineIOHelper that we'll be using to save the changes to the StoryList

    • Method Detail

      • addStory

        public void addStory(Story s)
        Adds the given story to the StoryList. If an identical story already exists, (same title and author), the original story will not be modified.
        Parameters:
        s - story to be added to the list

      • setStory

        public void setStory(Story s,
            int pos)
        Replaces the story currently at position pos with the given story. If the position given is out of the story list bounds, the given story isn't added to the StoryList
        Parameters:
        s - the story to replace with
        pos - the position to replace the story at

      • saveOfflineStories

        public void saveOfflineStories(StoryList storyList)
        Called whenever we want to save all of the stories in the StoryList to disk using the OfflineIOHelper. If the storylist is null, the offline Helper does not try to save any stories.
        Parameters:
        storyList - is the storyList that we want to save

      • createBlankStory

        public void createBlankStory()
        Creates a blank story by calling the no argument constructor of Story and adds it to the StoryList.
